channel.title: CNN
channel.description: CNN Senior Legal Analyst Elie Honig says the request for a special grand jury in the investigation into former President Donald Trump's efforts to overturn the election results in Georgia means the district attorney is looking for jury that can sit for as long as needed. #CNN #News

item.description: One Virginia school district is not backing down from Republican Gov. Glenn Youngkin's executive order that will allow parents to determine whether their children wear masks in school. CNN's Gary Tuchman speaks to the district's superintendent and parents who support and are against the governor's move.#CNN #News
item.title: School superintendent defies GOP governor’s mask directive
item.author: CNN

item.description: Florida Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis is proposing the creation of an election security force to monitor elections in the state. CNN’s Brianna Keilar discusses the proposal with Rep. Sheila Cherfilus-McCormick (D-FL). #CNN #News
item.title: Ron DeSantis wants to form an election security police force
item.author: CNN

item.description: Conservative MP David Davis, from the same party as Prime Minister Boris Johnson, called on the British leader to step down from office as Johnson faces a torrent of criticism from lawmakers and citizens over his alleged participation in a party held at 10 Downing Street in breach of Covid-19 rules. #CNN #News
item.title: 'In the name of God, go': Conservative MP to Boris Johnson
item.author: CNN

item.description: The House select committee investigating the January 6 riot is asking former President Donald Trump's daughter and then-senior White House adviser Ivanka Trump to voluntary cooperate with its investigation, a major step for the panel closing in on the former President's inner circle. CNN’s Paula Reid reports. #CNN #News
item.title: Jan. 6 panel wants to talk with Ivanka Trump
item.author: CNN

item.description: CNN Senior Legal Analyst Elie Honig says the request for a special grand jury in the investigation into former President Donald Trump's efforts to overturn the election results in Georgia means the district attorney is looking for jury that can sit for as long as needed. #CNN #News
item.title: Georgia DA requests special grand jury in Trump election probe
item.author: CNN

item.description: The New York attorney general's office has subpoenaed two of former President Donald Trump's adult children Ivanka Trump and Donald Trump, Jr for testimony as part of its civil investigation into whether the Trump Organization manipulated the values of its properties. #CNN #News
item.title: New York AG: ‘Misleading statements’ found in Trump Org. finances
item.author: CNN

item.description: Like many families right now, the Connell’s are doing their best to protect themselves from the Omicron surge. Here’s how they’ve decided to navigate this new phase of the pandemic. #CNN #News
item.title: Mom makes tough choices for kids during Omicron surge
item.author: CNN

item.description: Both vaccination and prior infection help protect against new Covid-19 infections, but vaccination protects against hospitalization significantly more than natural immunity from prior infection alone, according to a study published by the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. CNN's Elizabeth Cohen reports. #CNN #News
item.title: Vaccination protects against Covid-19 hospitalization more than prior infection
item.author: CNN

item.description: Anderson Cooper, Jeffrey Toobin and Maggie Haberman discuss the Supreme Court clearing the way for the release of presidential records from the Trump White House to a congressional committee investigating the January 6 attack on the US Capitol. #CNN #News
item.title: 'Extraordinary rebuke of the former President': Toobin weighs in on SCOTUS decision
item.author: CNN

item.description: After Martin Luther King Jr. Day, CNN's Abby Phillip and Manu Raju join John King for a discussion about voting rights and the role of the filibuster. #CNN #News #CITIZENbyCNN
item.title: Voting Rights: A Continued Fight for the Ballot Citizen By CNN
item.author: CNN

item.description: Brianna Keilar speaks to Chris Krebs, a cybersecurity official under former President Donald Trump, about whether it's possible to get through to people who remain convinced that the 2020 election was stolen. #CNN #News
item.title: Ex-Trump official: Reaching 'big lie' believers is beyond the control of a single individual
item.author: CNN

item.description:
New York Attorney General Letitia James has alleged that her office has uncovered significant evidence indicating that the Trump Organization used fraudulent or misleading asset valuations to obtain a host of economic benefits, including loans, insurance coverage, and tax deductions. Former Trump attorney Michael Cohen discusses Trump's business practices with CNN's Alisyn Camerota.
#CNN #News
item.title: Michael Cohen on how Trump would inflate property values
item.author: CNN

item.description:
CNN's Wolf Blitzer speaks with Rabbi Charlie Cytron-Walker, who recounts the moment he and three others escaped after a gunman held them hostage for 11 hours at Congregation Beth Israel, a synagogue in Colleyville, Texas.
#CNN #News
item.title: Rabbi Charlie Cytron-Walker recounts moment he escaped from synagogue gunman
item.author: CNN

item.description: CNN's Drew Griffin asked Sen. Richard Burr (R-NC) if he profited from insider stock trading in office. Here's how Burr responded. #CNN #News
item.title: A GOP senator attacked CNN instead of answering questions. Here's why
item.author: CNN

item.description: Ukrainian officials tell CNN's Matthew Chance that they are shocked and stunned at President Biden's remarks during a White House press conference about Russian President Vladimir Putin. #CNN #News
item.title: Ukrainian official: Biden's answer gives Putin ‘green light’ to invade
item.author: CNN

item.description:
The race for the 2024 Republican presidential nomination may have already started last week, after Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis gave a speech declaring his state is the “freest” in the country from Covid-19 mandates. In the latest episode of The Point, CNN’s Chris Cillizza analyzes DeSantis’ early 2024 jockeying and how one major factor stands in his way: former President Donald Trump.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: DeSantis draws contrast with federal government and Democratic-led states in State of the State address https://www.cnn.com/2022/01/11/politics/ron-desantis-state-of-the-state/index.html
‘You only care if it’s people you don’t like:’ DeSantis jabs media over Super Bowl virus coverage https://www.clickorlando.com/news/florida/2021/02/10/you-only-care-if-its-people-you-dont-like-desantis-jabs-media-over-super-bowl-virus-coverage/
Don't miss the latest evidence Ron DeSantis is *definitely* getting ready to run for president https://www.cnn.com/2021/06/23/politics/ron-desantis-florida-governor-2024-donald-trump/index.html
Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis signs restrictive voting bill https://www.cnn.com/2021/05/06/politics/desantis-signs-florida-bill-voting-restrictions/index.html
Trump Wins CPAC Straw Poll, but Only 68 Percent Want Him to Run Again https://www.nytimes.com/2021/02/28/us/politics/cpac-straw-poll-2024-presidential-race.html
https://www.ipsos.com/sites/default/files/ct/news/documents/2021-12/Reuters%20Ipsos%20Large%20Issue%20Poll%20No%206%20Topline%20-%20December%202021.pdf
Trump jabs DeSantis and 'gutless' politicians https://www.politico.com/newsletters/florida-playbook/2022/01/12/trump-jabs-desantis-and-gutless-politicians-495689
Why won't Ron DeSantis say if he's been boosted? https://www.cnn.com/2022/01/05/politics/ron-desantis-covid-vaccine-booster-shot/index.html
Donald Trump sends a very clear message to Ron DeSantis: Stay out of 2024! https://www.cnn.com/2021/10/04/politics/donald-trump-ron-desantis-florida-2024/index.html
DeSantis says he regrets not speaking out 'much louder' against Trump's recommendation to stay home https://www.cnn.com/2022/01/14/politics/desantis-trump-covid-response/index.html
About me: I was named best dressed in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily Point newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza Producer: Moira Donohue The Point Editor: Adam Wollner Video Editor: Kriston Lewis
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://www.cnn.com/specials/politics/the-point-with-chris-cillizza?source=Point_Youtube.
#CNN #Cillizza #DeSantis
item.title: Ron DeSantis just gave his first 2024 speech
item.author: CNN

item.description:
President Joe Biden address the nation and discusses the Russian buildup at the Ukraine border, the fight against Covid-19 and more.
#CNN #News
item.title: President Biden makes prediction about Putin and Ukraine - full press conference
item.author: CNN

item.description: Election officials in a rural Georgia county are weighing plans to close all but one polling place ahead of this year's elections, alarming local voting and civil rights groups. CNN's Dianne Gallagher reports. #CNN #News
item.title: Battleground state county plans deep cut to polling locations
item.author: CNN

item.description: With the 2022 midterm elections approaching, some Democrats are raising concerns that the Biden administration is not prepared to help the party maintain its slim congressional majority. #CNN #News
item.title: Biden leaves Democrats hanging as midterms burst into full swing
item.author: CNN

item.description: CNN's Brianna Keilar takes a look at how Fox fuels the spread of false and misleading information among the American public. #CNN #News
item.title: Brianna Keilar rolls the tape on Fox host going 'full Orwell'
item.author: CNN

item.description: The House Select Committee investigating the January 6 attack on the US Capitol issued a subpoena for former Trump attorney Rudy Giuliani, a central figure in the former president's failed bid to overturn the 2020 election. In addition to Giuliani, the committee issued subpoenas to two other attorneys who pushed election fraud conspiracies on Trump's behalf: Jenna Ellis and Sidney Powell. CNN's Jake Tapper, Paula Reid and Laura Coates discuss. #CNN #News
item.title: Jan. 6 committee subpoenas Giuliani and others
item.author: CNN
